meanings.definition: Shochetim - plural form of shochet, a person who is trained and certified to slaughter animals according to Jewish dietary laws.
meanings.sent1: The shochetim carefully follow the rules when preparing meat.
meanings.sent2: The shochetim in the community ensure that the meat is kosher.
meanings.sent3: The shochetim decided to have a friendly competition on who can prepare the best kosher meal.
meanings.sent4: The shochetim's precision in their work is as sharp as their knives.
meanings.sent5: The image of the shochetim at work is etched in my memory.
